item.title: MIUI OS1.0.11.0.UNKCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K70 China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K70 China

Codename: vermeer

Version: OS1.0.11.0.UNKCNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: 2316bc4e67f1f81a7f1f9a91d0ca14c8

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Touch controls in some scenarios
Fix: Theater mode stability
Fix: Icons weren't shown correctly in WeChat Pay version 8.0.44
Fix: Video playback stability in some scenarios
Fix: WLAN connection stability in some scenarios
Fix: Brightness didn't go down when Battery saver was turned on
Fix: Issues with gesture controls in Tencent Video while charging
[Floating windows]
Optimization: Display and performance improvements for floating windows
[Proactive intelligence]
New: Advanced AI technologies allow devices to assist you proactively (Beta)
New: Deep integration of large AI models empowers system apps

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
